attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jacqui Smith is one of the most incompetent home secretaries in this country´s history. After the countless "lost data" incidents, immigration blunders and her expenses claims for an 88p bath plug and pornography she should not have a job in politics never mind one of the most powerful positions in government.
Please Mr. Brown do us all, and yourself, a favour by getting rid of this imbecile.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
